nodes.text: Area three was a part of the home of the Knights of Silver Dawn settlement on the Heaven system planet Wind. After the Silver Dawn rescued Sean from the Vermilion Birds' raid on Nan Heli's villa and arrived home, Mistress White, deputy leader of the Knights, coordinated efforts at the settlement to alight supplies. During the process, White ordered the Knights to open a mine tunnel in area three with its new cutting equipment as planned. Later, White told the Knights that the Silver Dawn had taken five batches of emergency rations, and that the top five area representatives of their lottery rankings should come forward to retrieve them.
